file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: 'My first API'
  contact:
    email: support@example.com
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /allergens:
    get:
      tags:
        - allergens
      summary: 'Lista todas os alergênicos'
      operationId: GetAllergens
      parameters:
        -
          name: includes
          in: query
          description: 'Faz o include das relações '
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - allergens
      summary: 'Insere um novo alergênico'
      operationId: StoreAllergens
      parameters:
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome do alergênico'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/allergens/{id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - allergens
      summary: 'Lista todos os alergênicos'
      operationId: ShowAllergen
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: query
          description: 'ID do alergênico'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    put:
      tags:
        - allergens
      summary: 'Lista todos os alergênicos'
      operationId: UpdateAllergen
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do alergênico'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: name
          in: path
          description: 'Nome do alergênico'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - allergens
      summary: 'Lista todos os alergênicos'
      operationId: DeleteAllergen
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: query
          description: 'ID do alergênico'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /auth/login:
    post:
      tags:
        - auth
      summary: 'Autenticação de usuário'
      operationId: AuthLogin
      parameters:
        -
          name: email
          in: query
          description: 'E-mail para autenticação'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: password
          in: query
          description: 'Senha para autenticação'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /brands:
    get:
      tags:
        - brands
      summary: 'Lista todas as marcas'
      operationId: GetBrands
      parameters:
        -
          name: includes
          in: query
          description: 'Faz o include das relações '
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - brands
      summary: 'Insere uma nova marca'
      operationId: StoreBrands
      parameters:
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome da marca'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/brands/{id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - brands
      summary: 'Lista todas as marcas'
      operationId: ShowBrand
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: query
          description: 'ID da marca'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    put:
      tags:
        - brands
      summary: 'Lista todas as marcas'
      operationId: UpdateBrand
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: query
          description: 'ID da marca'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: name
          in: path
          description: 'Nome da marca'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - brands
      summary: 'Lista todas as marcas'
      operationId: DeleteBrand
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: query
          description: 'ID da marca'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /categories:
    get:
      tags:
        - categories
      summary: 'Lista todas as categorias'
      operationId: ListCategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: includes
          in: query
          description: 'Faz o include das relações '
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - categories
      summary: 'Insere uma nova categoria'
      operationId: StoreCategory
      parameters:
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/categories/{id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - categories
      summary: 'Mostra uma categoria'
      operationId: ShowCategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da marca'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    put:
      tags:
        - categories
      summary: 'Atualiza uma categoria'
      operationId: UpdateCategory
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - categories
      summary: 'Deleta uma categoria'
      operationId: DeleteCategory
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/categories/{id}/subcategories':
    get:
      tags:
        - categories
        - subcategories
      summary: 'Lista todas as subcategorias'
      operationId: ListSubcategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - categories
        - subcategories
      summary: 'Insere uma subcategoria'
      operationId: StoreSubcategory
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome para a subcategoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/categories/{id}/subcategories/{subcategoryId}':
    get:
      tags:
        - categories
        - subcategories
      summary: 'Mostra uma subcategoria'
      operationId: ShowSubategorie
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: subcategoryId
          in: path
          description: 'ID da subcategoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    put:
      tags:
        - categories
        - subcategories
      summary: 'Atualiza uma subcategoria'
      operationId: UpdateSubcategory
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: subcategoryId
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria a ser editada'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: category_id
          in: query
          description: 'ID da categoria '
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome para a subcategoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - categories
        - subcategories
      summary: 'Deleta uma subcategoria'
      operationId: DeleteSubcategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: subcategoryId
          in: path
          description: 'ID da subcategoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/ingredients/{id}/brands/{brandId}':
    post:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - brands
      summary: 'Vincula uma marca a um ingrediente'
      operationId: StoreIngredientBrands
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: brandId
          in: path
          description: 'ID da marca'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - brands
      summary: 'Desvincula uma marca de um ingrediente'
      operationId: DeleteIngredientBrands
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: brandId
          in: path
          description: 'ID da marca'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/ingredients/{id}/brands':
    get:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - brands
      summary: 'Mostra as marcas vinculadas a um ingrediente'
      operationId: GetIngredientBrands
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - brands
      summary: 'Vincula várias marcas a um ingrediente'
      operationId: StoreMultipleIngredientBrands
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: values
          in: query
          description: 'Objeto com ids das marcas'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: object
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/ingredients/{id}/categories/{categoryId}':
    post:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - categories
      summary: 'Vincula uma categoria a um ingrediente'
      operationId: StoreIngredientCategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: categoryId
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - categories
      summary: 'Desvincula uma categoria de um ingrediente'
      operationId: DeleteIngredientCategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: categoryId
          in: path
          description: 'ID da categoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/ingredients/{id}/categories':
    post:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - categories
      summary: 'Vincula várias categorias a um ingrediente'
      operationId: StoreMultipleIngredientCategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: values
          in: query
          description: 'Objeto com todas as categorias a serem vinculadas.'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/ingredients/{id}/categories/':
    get:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - categories
      summary: 'Mostra todas as categorias atribuidas a um ingrediente'
      operationId: ShowIngredientCategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/ingredients/{id}/subcategories/{subcategoryId}':
    post:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - subcategories
      summary: 'Vincula uma subcategoria a um ingrediente'
      operationId: StoreIngredientSubcategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: subcategoryId
          in: path
          description: 'ID da subcategoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - subcategories
      summary: 'Desvincula uma subcategoria de um ingrediente'
      operationId: DeleteIngredientSubcategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: subcategoryId
          in: path
          description: 'ID da subcategoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/ingredients/{id}/subcategories':
    post:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - subcategories
      summary: 'Vincula várias subcategorias a um ingrediente'
      operationId: StoreMultipleIngredientSubcategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: values
          in: query
          description: 'Objeto com todas as subcategorias a serem vinculadas.'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/ingredients/{id}/subcategories/':
    get:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - subcategories
      summary: 'Mostra todas as subcategoria atribuidas a um ingrediente'
      operationId: GetIngredientCategories
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/ingredients/{id}/substitutes/{substituteId}':
    post:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - substitutes
      summary: 'Vincula um ingrediente substituto a um ingrediente'
      operationId: StoreIngredientSubstitutes
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: substituteId
          in: path
          description: 'ID do substituto'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - substitutes
      summary: 'Desvincula um ingrediente substituto a um ingrediente'
      operationId: RemoveIngredientSubstitute
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: substituteId
          in: path
          description: 'ID do substituto'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/ingredients/{id}/substitutes/':
    get:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - substitutes
      summary: 'Mostra todos ingredientes substitutos vinculados'
      operationId: GetIngredientSubstitutes
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - ingredients
        - substitutes
      summary: 'Vincula várias ingrediente substituto a um ingrediente'
      operationId: StoreMultipleIngredientSubstitutes
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: values
          in: query
          description: 'Objeto com todas as subcategorias a serem vinculadas.'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: object
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /ingredients:
    get:
      tags:
        - ingredients
      summary: 'Lista todos os ingredientes'
      operationId: GetIngredients
      parameters:
        -
          name: includes
          in: query
          description: 'Faz o include das relações'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - ingredients
      summary: 'Insere um novo ingrediente'
      operationId: StoreIngredients
      parameters:
        -
          name: name
          in: path
          description: 'Nome do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: flavor
          in: path
          description: 'Gosto no qual o ingrediente se encaixa'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: characteristics
          in: path
          description: 'Array com as caracteristicas do objeto'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        -
          name: nicknames
          in: path
          description: 'Array com possiveis outros nomes para este ingrediente'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        -
          name: strong
          in: path
          description: 'Se o ingrediente tem um gosto forte'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: boolean
        -
          name: light
          in: path
          description: 'Se o ingrediente é light'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: boolean
        -
          name: allergen_id
          in: path
          description: 'Se o ingrediente é alergenico'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: askable
          in: path
          description: 'Se o ingrediente é exibio no assistente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: boolean
        -
          name: main_ingredient
          in: path
          description: 'É o ingrediente principal da receita?'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: boolean
        -
          name: contains_gluten
          in: path
          description: 'Se o ingrediente contem gluten'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: boolean
        -
          name: subcategory_id
          in: path
          description: 'id da subcategoria'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/ingredients/{id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - ingredients
      summary: 'Mostra um ingrediente'
      operationId: ShowIngredients
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    put:
      tags:
        - ingredients
      summary: 'Atualiza um ingrediente'
      operationId: UpdateIngredient
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: name
          in: path
          description: 'Nome do ingrediente'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: flavor
          in: path
          description: 'Gosto no qual o ingrediente se encaixa'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: characteristics
          in: path
          description: 'Objeto com as caracteristicas do ingrediente'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: object
        -
          name: nicknames
          in: path
          description: 'Objeto com possiveis outros nomes para o ingrediente'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: object
        -
          name: strong
          in: path
          description: 'Se o ingrediente tem um gosto forte'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
        -
          name: light
          in: path
          description: 'Se o ingrediente é light'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
        -
          name: allergen_id
          in: path
          description: 'Se o ingrediente é alergenico'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: askable
          in: path
          description: 'Se o ingrediente é exibio no assistente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: boolean
        -
          name: main_ingredient
          in: path
          description: 'É o ingrediente principal da receita?'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: boolean
        -
          name: contains_gluten
          in: path
          description: 'Se o ingrediente contem gluten'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - ingredients
      summary: 'Deleta um ingrediente'
      operationId: DeleteIngredients
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do ingrediente'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /measures:
    get:
      tags:
        - measures
      summary: 'Lista todas as unidades de medida'
      operationId: ListMeasures
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  /occasions:
    get:
      tags:
        - occasions
      summary: 'Lista todos as ocasiões'
      operationId: ListOccasions
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/recipes/{id}/directions':
    get:
      tags:
        - recipes
        - directions
      summary: 'Mostra as direções vincula a receita.'
      operationId: ShowRecipeDirection
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do da receita'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    post:
      tags:
        - recipes
        - directions
      summary: 'Cria uma direção e vincula a receita.'
      operationId: StoreRecipeDirection
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do da receita'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome da direção'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: order
          in: query
          description: 'Numero do passo a ser vinculado'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/recipes/{id}/directions/sort':
    post:
      tags:
        - recipes
        - directions
      summary: 'Organizas as direções da receita.'
      operationId: SortRecipeDirection
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do da receita'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: order
          in: query
          description: 'Array com os ids '
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
  '/recipes/{id}/directions/{directionId}':
    put:
      tags:
        - recipes
        - directions
      summary: 'Atualiza uma direção vinculada a receita.'
      operationId: UpdateRecipeDirection
      parameters:
        -
          name: id
          in: path
          description: 'ID do da receita'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: directionId
          in: path
          description: 'ID da direção'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        -
          name: name
          in: query
          description: 'Nome da direção'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        -
          name: order
          in: query
          description: 'Numero do passo a ser vinculado'
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ...
    delete:
      tags:
        - recipes
        - directions
      summary: 'Deleta uma direção de uma receita.'
      operationId: DeleteRecipeDirection
      parameters:
        -
